nodes.name: Schedule Trigger - Check Reminders
nodes.notes: Runs every hour to check for pending travel reminders

assignments.name: compiled_itinerary

parameters.html:
‚úàÔ∏è Travel Itinerary

Booking Reference: {{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.booking_id }}

üë§ Traveler Information

Name:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.traveler.name }}
Email:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.traveler.email }}
Number of Travelers:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.traveler.travelers_count }}
Booking Status:
‚úì {{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.status }}

‚úàÔ∏è Flight Details

{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.outbound_flight.flight_number }}
Airline: {{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.outbound_flight.airline }}
Outbound
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.trip.departure_date }}
Route:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.trip.origin }} ‚Üí {{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.trip.destination }}
Departure:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.outbound_flight.departure_time }}
Arrival:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.outbound_flight.arrival_time }}
Duration:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.outbound_flight.duration }}
Stops:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.outbound_flight.stops }}
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.return_flight.flight_number }}
Airline: {{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.return_flight.airline }}
Return
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.trip.return_date }}
Route:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.trip.destination }} ‚Üí {{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.trip.origin }}
Departure:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.return_flight.departure_time }}
Arrival:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.return_flight.arrival_time }}
Duration:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.return_flight.duration }}
Stops:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.return_flight.stops }}

üè® Accommodation

{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.accommodation.name }}
Hotel ID:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.accommodation.hotel_id }}
Address:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.accommodation.address }}
Distance from Airport:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.accommodation.distance }}
Check-in:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.trip.departure_date }}
Check-out:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.trip.return_date }}
Nights:
{{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.nights }}
Price per Night:
${{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.accommodation.price_per_night }}
Rating:
‚≠ê {{ Number($json.confirmed_itinerary.accommodation.rating).toFixed(1) }}/5

üí≥ Payment Summary

Flights ({{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.traveler.travelers_count }} travelers): ${{ Number($json.confirmed_itinerary.pricing.total_flight_cost).toFixed(2) }}
Accommodation ({{ $json.confirmed_itinerary.nights }} nights): ${{ Number($json.confirmed_itinerary.pricing.accommodation_cost).toFixed(2) }}
Total Amount: ${{ Number($json.confirmed_itinerary.pricing.grand_total).toFixed(2) }}
‚úÖ Payment Confirmed - Transaction ID: {{ $json.transaction_id }}
‚è∞ Important Reminder: You will receive an email reminder 24 hours before your departure with check-in information and travel tips.

Travel Tips:

‚Ä¢ Arrive at airport 3 hours early for international flights

‚Ä¢ Ensure passport is valid for at least 6 months from travel date

‚Ä¢ Check baggage allowances with airline

Need assistance? Contact us at support@travelbooking.com | +1-800-TRAVEL

Generated on {{ new Date().toLocaleString() }}

parameters.subject: =‚è∞ Flight Tomorrow - {{ $json.Booking_ID }}
parameters.message:
=

‚è∞ Travel Reminder - Your Flight is Tomorrow!

Dear {{ $json.Name }},

This is a reminder that your flight {{ $json.Flight_Number }} departs tomorrow on {{ $json.Departure_Date }}.

Pre-Flight Checklist:

  • ‚úì Complete online check-in
  • ‚úì Print or download boarding passes
  • ‚úì Check baggage weight limits
  • ‚úì Verify passport/ID validity
  • ‚úì Arrive at airport 2-3 hours early
  • ‚úì Arrange airport transportation

Safe travels!
